mapper.select: SELECT COUNT(*) AS HOS_CATE_CNT, SUM(CASE WHEN HOS_CATE LIKE '%강아지%' THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) AS dog_hos, SUM(CASE WHEN HOS_CATE LIKE '%고양이%' THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) AS cat_hos, SUM(CASE WHEN HOS_CATE LIKE '%새%' THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) AS bird_hos, SUM(CASE WHEN HOS_CATE LIKE '%파충류%' THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) AS rept_hos, SUM(CASE WHEN HOS_CATE LIKE '%기타%' THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) AS etc_hos FROM hospital WHERE HOS_DEL = 'N';
